name: Homeless Prenatal Program
description: To access drop-in services clients may call HPP’s remote intake line at 415-754-0581 or complete the client services interest form. Clients may work directly with their case manager, counselor, or therapist to schedule meetings onsite at HPP. Remote virtual services will continue and they anticipate maintaining a combination of in person and virtual services. Meetings can take place inside offices, the garden and larger communal spaces inside the building. Staff and Clients will be asked to comp
